column1: '''Habbanan beneath the Stars''' is a poem written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. It was composed either in December [[1915]] at Brocton Camp
column3: or in June [[1916]] at Ã‰taples. The poem
column5: speaks about the fate of [[Men]] after death (albeit being a very early phase of the [[legendarium]]). It was published in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales Part One]]''.<ref>{{LT1|IIIn}}
